sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_ex_sp.ContentSearchUtilsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>[WARNING: Customers should NOT modify this script]

The purpose of this script include is to provide default behaviours for the ContentSearchUtilsSNC script include.
To change the behaviour of these methods (or add new methods), Customers should override/add new methods to the ContentSearchUtils script include. </description>
        <name>ContentSearchUtilsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ContentSearchUtilsSNC = Class.create();
    ContentSearchUtilsSNC.EVENTS = {
    AIS_MODE_CHANGE_EVENT: "sn-esc#aisModeChangeEvent",
    AIS_REFRESH_RESULTS_EVENT: "sn-esc#aisRefreshResultsEvent",
    AIS_RESULTS_UPDATED_EVENT: "sn-esc#aisResultsUpdatedEvent",
    AIS_LOADING_EVENT: "sn-esc#aisLoadingEvent"
    };
    ContentSearchUtilsSNC.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
    },
  
    getInstanceEvents: function(instanceId){
      var modifiedEvents = this.getEvents();
      var concatInstanceId = instanceId ? instanceId : '';
      Object.keys(modifiedEvents).forEach(function(key){
        modifiedEvents[key] = concatInstanceId + '#' + modifiedEvents[key];
      });
      return modifiedEvents;
    },

    getEvents: function(){
      return ContentSearchUtilsSNC.EVENTS;
    },

    type: 'ContentSearchUtilsSNC'
    };]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-11-02 09:03:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>032d28e367325110238b16f688f922db</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ContentSearchUtilsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Center" source="sn_ex_sp">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_032d28e367325110238b16f688f922db</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-11-02 11:24:53</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
